meanings.definition: The land or area directly next to a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The waterfront was filled with families enjoying the sunny day by the lake.
meanings.sent2: We decided to have a picnic by the waterfront to enjoy the beautiful view.
meanings.sent3: The ducks waddled along the waterfront, looking for tasty treats.
meanings.sent4: Her smile sparkled like the sunlight reflecting off the waterfront.
meanings.sent5: The sound of waves crashing against the waterfront was soothing.

meanings.definition: A location or property situated along a body of water.
meanings.sent1: The waterfront property had a stunning view of the ocean.
meanings.sent2: Many restaurants on the waterfront offer fresh seafood dishes.
meanings.sent3: The waterfront was bustling with tourists eager to explore the area.
meanings.sent4: His eyes lit up when he saw the beautiful sunset from the waterfront.
meanings.sent5: The waterfront at night was illuminated by the shimmering lights of boats.
